# Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayPeriod.Width.abbreviated

**Case**

A shortened day period width representation.

## Declaration

```swift
case abbreviated
```

## Modifying a Day Period Width

- **Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayPeriod.Width.narrow**: The shortest day period width representation.
- **Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayPeriod.Width.wide**: A full day period width representation.

items.description: A full day period width representation.
